checkboxes.coffee

¶

checkboxes

checkboxes creates a list of checkboxes from an array each item in the array should have a display and value attribute

usage:

template = -> checkboxes "checkbox_group", [{display: 'Option 1', value: '1'}, {display: 'Option 2', value: '2'}]

renders

 
module.exports = (name, list, attributes) ->
  for item in list
    checkbox name, item.display, item.value, attributes
